summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of the alley in plat of Montbeacon, being the alley between 12th Ave. S. and 13th Ave. S. from S. Forest St. to S. McClellan St.; and certain other alleys; by paving the same; by doing such grading or regrading as may be necessary; providing for the necessary surface drainage; all in accordance with Resolution 26080 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
